column4: would anyone be able to help me.  I have just installed ubuntu 7.10 and the drivers for my NVidia card but my computer still feels really sluggish. The computer has 512 RAM it says there is only 386 available, could this be the problem?
i had a linux pc with 512 ram
You'll need to edit a configuration file so you don't have so many user pipes running
Google should be able to help you out with this.
top
ok i will
Wow it looks like it could rain here!
:Swap:   859436k total,   184572k used,   674864k free,    77620k cached
thats what I have there
load average: 1.18, 0.70, 0.86
It's definately a RAM issue.
test
no not much disk activity, it just feels really slow to swtich between programs
and firefox is really slow to draw pages once you scroll down or up
woo_), i know this could be irrelevant, but what desktop manager are you running?
woo_), i know this could be irrelevant, but what desktop manager are you running?
im using that AWN desktop manager
oh
but it still felt slow before i installed that.
haven't considered using xfce4 or fluxbox?
ohh yeah and I have that compiz thing installed
would that be it?
no that should be fine
